subject: Accelerator pedal Bolt
description_text:
Hello, I was trying to unscrew the bolt on the accelerator plate to install
the vam motor pack only to find that the screw is stripped and I have no
way of unscrewing it now using the Allen keys provided. Is there any
possible solution to this or can I be provided with a refund to return the
product?

conversations.body_text: It's usually $199. The NEW15 should be $179.

Hi Haris Karim,    We regret to inform you that your order has already been dispatched and we are unable to cancel it. May we ask why you wish to cancel this order?  https://www.sf-express.com/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6045960044215

I was looking to order a different VAM motor pack

On Wed, 15 Oct 2025 at 08:13, support@simsonn.com
Hi Haris Karim,    We are so sorry that we have not fully understood your meaning. Please elaborate on what you require, and we may be able to assist you.

I waited two weeks for this product to arrive and I’m rather disappointed
that the second bolt I find to unscrew is not up to standard and now I
can’t use the motor packs I’ve purchased  or undo the pedal plate for
adjustment. Both the pedals and the motor pack can’t be used to my liking
now.
I have the same problem on the brake pedal faceplate aswell
ID 号为 4544 和 4894 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单4544  
      主题: Discount Codes  
      描述:  Hello, I was wondering what the minimum spend was for the store discount codes, I’ve seen a couple like NEW15 and FFLV20 but there’s a minimum spend.

合并来自工单4894  
      主题: Cancellation of Order #SSN2879  
      描述:  I was wondering if it was possible to cancel this order or not.

Hi Haris Karim,  Please provide a photo of the stripped screw, so I can check the situation for you. This is not a quality issue — when a hex screw is turned multiple times or at an improper angle, it can become stripped. You can try using a different tool, such as a slightly larger hex key or a flathead screwdriver, to remove it carefully. These screws are standard parts, not custom-made, and we can also send you some replacement screws if needed.

No hex key I have is able to turn this. The one tat was provided that I
tried first wasn’t able to turn it. A new set of bolts would be appreciated
but it’s not going to amount to much if I can’t take it out in the first
place and the nut on the back is tightened too much in such a confined
space that I can’t get the spanner onto it to twist.

On Wed, 22 Oct 2025 at 03:48, support@simsonn.com

The bolt I also too tight to unscrew with a screwdriver I have no way of
removing this pedal plate and same goes for the brake pedal.

Hi Haris Karim,  The screws are tightened at the factory to prevent the panel from loosening, and it’s quite rare for customers to strip them. I will check with our production department to see if a different type of screwdriver can be used to remove them.

I found a spanner I had which was capable of removing it but if it’s
possible to send a new bag of bolts that would be appreciated


On Wed, 22 Oct 2025 at 08:39, support@simsonn.com
Hi Haris Karim,  Please provide your contact name, phone number, and shipping address. We will send you a new set of PlusX silver panel screws.

Haris Karim, +44 7741 900667
S1 2NY
Yorkshire
Sheffield
The Paperwork’s York Street

On Thu, 23 Oct 2025 at 03:49, support@simsonn.com
Hi Haris Karim,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045988929015https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045988929015
